title: Key Frags
body: I've been playing a  lot more and have gone from b5 to b3 and am continuing to move up. But i haven't earned a key fragment in weeks, anyone know why?

replies.body: The rate of fragment drops become slower with each one obtained, until it resets roughly every 30 days.  Your placement in ranked doesn't affect the rate of drops, so no worries about that.  DTN provided a great [Hextech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) for more context, but please let us know if you have any questions!

Key fragment drop rate decreases exponentially each time you get one, and this rate resets roughly every 30 days (after you got your first fragment). Basically, you'll get many at the start of the 30 days then you'll quickly get much less. If you go so many wins without getting one you're guaranteed one on the next win (not sure on the specific number, might be the 11th win).

Read here for more info; https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide
